post.body: YES!! You GO, gurl!
Thanks, man! I'm glad ya liked it. I think it's safe to say, it gets better as it goes along.
a book you say?? like .. maybe a novel or something??
ahhh .. gotcha .. sorry - too much going on here today :)
what?
you're welcome but i have the uneasy feeling that it's not twitter that I'm smelling ... and I'm the only other one here.
oh .. you mean grabbing the feed of the radio show? Hm. I'm already downloading more each week than I can listen to ...
oh joy! I've been grading finals for the last two hours and NOW i'm gonna get breakfast. I earned it.
Ketzel's series is a good one, too. But podcasts are taking most of my "ear time" these days. Radio is a "last resort."
math is winning? cashier ill equipped to deal with the vagaries of the evil Maths?
Aww thanks! I missed having it out there, too. Happy Holidays, lil Elf.
um.. sorry man. i dont have the text with me .. :)
you're welcome!! :)
Seasonal Felicitations to you and yours :)
that's a beautiful picture of you!!
bleah .. i'm glad sleep is over rated cuz I dont get much
ok twitterverse i'm going to sleep now. you can talk about me behind my back.
grading is done. semester is over. now i have to design a course that starts in 4 weeks. EEERK!! Happy Academic Holidays
we're grading .. grading .. keep grading .. grading ...
hey, kids! What time is it??
ahh .. i love the smell of twitter in the morning ... smells like .. old socks??!!
~P~ morning, twitterville.
mercy - what happened to the morning??
this semester ends in 2 more days. then i have 3 weeks to plan for next. whee!
Tip for students: When doing an essay exam, it's considered good form when answering a question to actually answer the question that's asked
hello, twitterverse.
